title: Pretty Little Liars
context:
Pretty Little Liars is an American teen drama mystery thriller television series developed by I. Marlene King and is loosely based on the novel series of the same name written by Sara Shepard.
The series follows the lives of four high school girls whose clique falls apart after the disappearance of their leader.
One year later, the estranged friends are reunited as they begin receiving messages from a mysterious figure named "A" who threatens to expose their deepest secrets.

title: How to get away with murder
context:
How to Get Away with Murder is an American drama television series that premiered on ABC on September 25, 2014.
The series was created by Peter Nowalk, and produced by Shonda Rhimes and ABC Studios.
The series airs on ABC as part of a night of programming, all under Rhimes's Shondaland production company.
